Package ca.ualberta.ishelf.RecyclerAdapters

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BorrowAdapter
    BorrowAdapter Send in either: Allows for searching of firebase (description)
    BorrowAdapter.BorrowViewHolder
    BorrowViewHolder holds information about a book (name, description, user, rating) and is clickable
    BorrowFragment
    BorrowFragment Send in either: key: "Book" - a Book object US 03.01.01 As a borrower, I want to specify a set of keywords, and search for all books that are not currently accepted or borrowed whose description contains all the keywords.
    GalleryAdapter
    GalleryAdapter This is just a normal adapter, but for GalleryActivity (and associated recyclerView)
    GalleryAdapter.GalleryViewHolder  
    LORRecyclerViewAdapter
    This is the adapter for the List of requests for the recycler view
    MyAdapter
    THis is the adapter for the myBooks fragmesnt TODO get actual images instead of the 3 temp ones
    myBooksFragment
    US 01.04.01 As an owner, I want to view a list of all my books, and their descriptions, statuses, and current borrowers.
    NotificationAdapter
    //adapter for the notification recycler view //works like all the other adapters in the project.
    NotificationAdapter.NotificationViewHolder  
    RatingsAdapter
    This is the adapter for the List of requests for the recycler view
    RequestAdapter
    adapter for the RequestFragment recycler view
    RequestAdapter.RequestViewHolder  
    RequestFragment
    Requests Activity US 04.02.01 (2) As a borrower, I want to view a list of books I have requested, each book with its description, and owner username.
